name: MEC Skin Neoprene Gloves - Unisex
description: A bit of warmth and protection, these 0.5mm neoprene gloves are thin enough that you can still feel your board or the paddle in your hands. Great for canoeist, kayakers and surfers, they allow enough dexterity that you could use them for wet-weather cycle commutes too.Made of super-stretchy 0.5mm neoprene that adds warmth without bulk.Silicon print on palms and fingers adds grip in slippery situations.Pull-on cuffs stay put.
